languages.text: {n}Тервантьяс замолкает на несколько секунд.{/n} "Чтобы отплатить Кикеросс за обман, я направлю {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Изыскателя страданий{/d} на арену. Пока ведьмы будут лишать тебя жизни, он прикончит нескольких из них. Изыскатель боли все равно слишком заметен, чтобы скрыть его от охотниц культа. Пусть мое творение исполнит симфонию боли, для которой было изготовлено!"

{n}Tervantias is silent for a few moments.{/n} "To repay Keykeross for her treachery, I will send the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Anguish Prospector{/d} to the arena. While the Wyches are preoccupied with ending your life, the Prospector will kill several of them. Regardless, it is too conspicuous for me to hide from the Cult's huntresses. Let my creation perform the symphony of pain for which it was designed!"
languages.original_text: {n}Тервантьяс замолкает на несколько секунд.{/n} "Чтобы отплатить Кикеросс за обман, я направлю {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Изыскателя страданий{/d} на арену. Пока ведьмы будут лишать тебя жизни, он прикончит нескольких из них. Изыскатель боли все равно слишком заметен, чтобы скрыть его от охотниц культа. Пусть мое творение исполнит симфонию боли, для которой было изготовлено!"

Let my creation perform the symphony of pain for which it was designed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias is silent for a few moments.{/n} "To repay Keykeross for her treachery, I will send the Anguish Prospector to assist you. It is still too cumbersome to make it past the Wyches. Let my creation perform the symphony of pain for which it was designed!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias is silent for a few moments.{/n} "To repay Keykeross for her treachery, I will send the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Anguish Prospector{/d} to the arena. While the Wyches are preoccupied with ending your life, the Prospector will kill several of them. Regardless, it is too conspicuous for me to hide from the Cult's huntresses. Let my creation perform the symphony of pain for which it was designed!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias reste silencieux un moment.{/n} « Pour me venger de ce coup bas de Keykeross, je suis prêt à vous faire accompagner par le {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Supplicieur{/d}. Il sera capable de tuer plusieurs des Cérastes pendant qu'elles seront occupées à essayer de vous mettre à mort. Dans tous les cas, il attire trop l'attention pour que je puisse échapper aux chasseuses du Culte. Puisse ma création accomplir la symphonie de douleur pour laquelle je l'ai conçue ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias is silent for a few moments.{/n} "To repay Keykeross for her treachery, I will send the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Anguish Prospector{/d} to the arena. While the Wyches are preoccupied with ending your life, the Prospector will kill several of them. Regardless, it is too conspicuous for me to hide from the Cult's huntresses. Let my creation perform the symphony of pain for which it was designed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias reste silencieux un moment.{/n} « Pour me venger de ce coup bas de Keykeross, je suis prêt à vous faire accompagner par le {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Supplicieur{/d}. Il sera capable de tuer plusieurs des Cérastes pendant qu'elles seront occupées à essayer de vous mettre à mort. Dans tous les cas, il attire trop l'attention pour que je puisse échapper aux chasseuses du Culte. Puisse ma création accomplir la symphonie de douleur pour laquelle je l'ai conçue ! »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯沉默片刻。{/n}“为了回敬绮克萝丝的背叛行为，我愿意派遣{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}痛苦勘探者{/d}来协助你。那群巫灵打算要你的命，我的勘探者应该能在战斗中弄死几个巫灵。而且他的块头实在是太大了，如果要带上他，我就没办法躲过那些那些巫灵的视线了。就让我的杰作奏响痛苦的交响乐吧，它为了痛苦而生！”
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias is silent for a few moments.{/n} "To repay Keykeross for her treachery, I will send the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Anguish Prospector{/d} to the arena. While the Wyches are preoccupied with ending your life, the Prospector will kill several of them. Regardless, it is too conspicuous for me to hide from the Cult's huntresses. Let my creation perform the symphony of pain for which it was designed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯沉默片刻。{/n}“为了回敬绮克萝丝的背叛行为，我愿意派遣痛苦勘探者来协助你。他的块头太大了，没法瞒过那些巫灵的眼睛。就让我的杰作奏响痛苦的交响乐吧，它就是为了痛苦而生的！”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias schweigt eine Weile.{/n} "Um Keykeross für ihren Verrat zu bestrafen, schicke ich den {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Qualensucher{/d} in die Arena. Während die Hekatari damit beschäftigt sind, Euer Leben zu beenden, wird der Sucher einige von ihnen töten. Allerdings wäre es zu offensichtlich, mich vor den Jägerinnen des Kultes zu verstecken. Lasst meine Schöpfung die Sinfonie der Schmerzen aufführen, für die sie erschaffen wurde!"
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias is silent for a few moments.{/n} "To repay Keykeross for her treachery, I will send the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Anguish Prospector{/d} to the arena. While the Wyches are preoccupied with ending your life, the Prospector will kill several of them. Regardless, it is too conspicuous for me to hide from the Cult's huntresses. Let my creation perform the symphony of pain for which it was designed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias schweigt einige Augenblicke lang.{/n} "Um Keykeross für ihren Verrat zu bestrafen, schicke ich den Qualensucher, Euch zu unterstützen. Er ist noch zu schwerfällig, um an den Hekatari vorbeizukommen. Lasst meine Schöpfung die Symphonie der Schmerzen aufführen, für die sie erschaffen wurde!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias se queda en silencio por un momento.{/n} «Enviaré al {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Atormentador{/d} en tu ayuda para hacer pagar a Keykeross por su traición. Mientras las brujas están ocupadas con matarte, el Atormentador acabará con varias de ellas. Además, es demasiado ostentoso como para esconderlo de las brujas del culto. ¡Que mi creación interprete la sinfonía de torturas para la que se diseñó!».
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias is silent for a few moments.{/n} "To repay Keykeross for her treachery, I will send the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Anguish Prospector{/d} to the arena. While the Wyches are preoccupied with ending your life, the Prospector will kill several of them. Regardless, it is too conspicuous for me to hide from the Cult's huntresses. Let my creation perform the symphony of pain for which it was designed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias se queda en silencio por un momento.{/n} «Enviaré al Atormentador en tu ayuda para hacer pagar a Keykeross por su traición. Cruzar el lugar donde se asientan las brujas sigue siendo tarea difícil. ¡Que mi creación interprete la danza del tormento para la que se diseñó!».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは、しばらく黙り込む。{/n}「キーケロスの裏切りの報復として、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}苦悩のプロスペクター{/d}をアリーナへ送り込む。ウィッチがお前にとどめを刺すのに夢中になっている間に、プロスペクターは連中のいくらかの息の根を止めるだろう。とはいえ、あれは魔女団の狩人どもから隠れるには目立ちすぎる。私の創造物に苦痛のシンフォニーを奏でさせるとしよう！」
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias is silent for a few moments.{/n} "To repay Keykeross for her treachery, I will send the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Anguish Prospector{/d} to the arena. While the Wyches are preoccupied with ending your life, the Prospector will kill several of them. Regardless, it is too conspicuous for me to hide from the Cult's huntresses. Let my creation perform the symphony of pain for which it was designed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスは、しばらく黙り込む。{/n}「キーケロスの裏切りの報復として、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}苦悩のプロスペクター{/d}をアリーナへ送り込む。ウィッチがお前にとどめを刺すのに夢中になっている間に、プロスペクターは連中のいくらかの息の根を止めるだろう。とはいえ、あれは魔女団の狩人どもから隠れるには目立ちすぎる。私の創造物に苦痛のシンフォニーを奏でさせるとしよう！」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias, bir süre sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Keykeross'a ihanetinin bedelini ödetmek için arenaya {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Izdırap Arayıcı{/d}'yı göndereceğim. Viçler senin hayatını sonlandırmakla meşgulken Arayıcı da onlardan birkaçını öldürür. Zaten Tarikat'ın avcılarından saklayamayacağım kadar göze çarpan bir şey. Yaratımım, dizayn edilme amacını yerine getirsin ve bir acı senfonisi sahnelesin!"
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias is silent for a few moments.{/n} "To repay Keykeross for her treachery, I will send the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Anguish Prospector{/d} to the arena. While the Wyches are preoccupied with ending your life, the Prospector will kill several of them. Regardless, it is too conspicuous for me to hide from the Cult's huntresses. Let my creation perform the symphony of pain for which it was designed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias bir süre sessiz kalıyor.{/n} "Keykeross'a ihanetinin bedelini ödetmek için arenaya {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_PatchedMonster}Izdırap Arayıcı{/d}'yı göndereceğim. Viçler hayatını sonlandırmakla meşgulken, Arayıcı onlardan birkaçını öldürür. Zaten Tarikat'ın avcılarından saklayamayacağım kadar göze çarpan bir şey. Yaratımım, dizayn edilme amacını yerine getirsin ve bir acı senfonisi sahnelesin!"
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
